00016 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00017  * Partitioning algorithm for contributing invariant mass channels into pairs    *
00018  * for determining the minimal invariant mass of a timelike phase-space channel. *
00019  *                                                                               *
00020  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00021 
00022 namespace Camorra
00023 {
00024     class bi_partition: public std::vector< std::vector< std::pair<std::size_t,std::size_t> > >
00025     {
00026         public:
00027 
00028             typedef std::size_t index_type;
00029             typedef std::size_t size_type;
00030 
00032 
00033             bi_partition(const std::set<index_type>&);
00034 
00035         private:
00036             
00037             /* Partition construction iteration: */
00038 
00039             void add_partition(const std::set<size_type>&);
00040 
00041             /* Partition construction iteration helper: */
00042 
00043             bool next_index_set(size_type);
00044 
00045             size_type n;
00046             std::vector<size_type>kappa;
00047             std::vector<size_type>maxima;
00048     };
00049 
00050     /* Partition printing facility: */
00051 
00052     std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream&,const bi_partition&);
